title: University degrees and transcripts
dataVerified: Student name, degree title, major/field of study, graduation date, university name, honors/distinctions
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents diploma mills and credential fraud. Instant verification for employers and graduate schools. Graduates don't need to request official transcripts for every application, reducing administrative burden and cost while maintaining document authenticity.
